meanings.sent1: I bought two loafs of bread at the store.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells various types of loafs every day.
meanings.sent3: The picnic basket was filled with delicious loafs for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: The kitchen was filled with the comforting aroma of freshly baked loafs.
meanings.sent5: The children eagerly devoured the warm loafs of banana bread.

meanings.definition: Third person singular present of loaf
meanings.sent1: He loafs around the house on lazy Sundays.
meanings.sent2: She loafs in the park, enjoying the sunshine.
meanings.sent3: The cat loafs on the windowsill, basking in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The student loafs in the library instead of studying.
meanings.sent5: The dog loafs on the couch, waiting for its owner to return.

meanings.definition: Third person singular present of loaf
meanings.sent1: The bread loafs nicely in the oven, turning golden brown.
meanings.sent2: The dough loafs as it rises, creating a fluffy texture.
meanings.sent3: The pastry chef loafs the bread dough with precision and care.
meanings.sent4: The baker loafs the artisanal bread to perfection every time.
meanings.sent5: The baker loafs the sourdough bread for hours to achieve the perfect crust.
